Both 320693 LZ77 12286 LZ78 8151 367470 212646 322219 principle. In LZ77, 0 58008 42233 45266 320693 "sliding window" 142413 320693 168772 N 35191 211537 77139 processed. An 150859 356839 211537 369115 158525 355964 324864 268490 320693 99560 211537 0 string, 295961 320693 113287 150859 211537 320693 84989 158525 one. At 94674 303741 211537 320693 99424 process, 146981 321218 158525 200531 match, 320908 320693 168772 181054 150859 (or zero) 12286 52710 19298 38715 3511 324864 320693 84989 12286 217180 324864 320693 64861 stream. LZW 158525 290829 324864 LZ78, but, 320693 84989 158525 152803 324864 8523 243888 symbols. The 324288 148762 367543 366584 8 35157 symbols, 295961 320693 84989 "codes" 116302 137876 00 324864 137876 FF (decimal 255) 19298 pre-defined.
